attributes.action: We the public don't want the Prime Minister to send our troops to the Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: It's not our war, and Zelensky doesn't seem to want peace he is more interested in getting money for the continuation of war
attributes.background: We the public don't wish our troops to be sent to the Ukraine as peace keepers, we don't agree with the Ukrainian Prime Ministers views on continuing the war or it's reasons

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Don't send troops to Ukraine to support peacekeeping
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705814
